blocking_pages_rule_content_description.message: %name% prevented this page from loading because it was flagged as a tracking resource.

description.message: Qwant VIPrivacy sets qwant.com as your default search engine, blocks trackers for you to protect your personal data while you browse

global_stats_disable_description.message: With this action, all cumulative statistics so far will be lost.

global_stats_enabled_success.message: Statistics activated! Start browsing the web, and your numbers will be displayed here.

missing_permissions_default_search_engin.message: Every query you put in the address bar goes to Qwant.
Qwant is your default search engine

missing_permissions_disabled_description.message: Your data remains confidential when you search on Qwant, but the trackers and cookies blocking is not activated.

onboarding_step_alert_permission_descrip.message: We recommend that you choose Qwant as your default search engine. If you have change your mind

onboarding_step_alert_permission_title.message: You have refused the required browser permissions.

onboarding_step_mode_description.message: You can change your choice at any time by clicking on the icon

onboarding_step_mode_search_protection_d.message: Default search engine with protection against trackers and cookies

onboarding_step_protection_level_descrip.message: You can change your choice at any time by clicking on the Qwant VIPrivacy icon.

onboarding_step_request_permissions_desc.message: Qwant VIPrivacy blocks trackers and refuses cookies for you. Your personal data is protected on all sites when you browse.

onboarding_step_telemetry_checkbox_label.message: Send anonymous usage statistics and error reports

onboarding_step_telemetry_description.message: Share your feedback anonymously to help us improve your protection.

onboarding_step_thank_you_chrome_2_descr.message: On your first search, select « Keep it » when Chrome prompts you.

onboarding_step_thank_you_chrome_2_title.message: Make sure you keep Qwant as your default search engine.

onboarding_step_thank_you_edge_1_descrip.message: In the « Extension »  menu, then « Manage Extensions »

onboarding_step_thank_you_edge_2_descrip.message: And follow your stats in real time

onboarding_step_thank_you_features.message: Zero tracking of your searches; Zero advertising tracking; Zero sale of your personal data

popup_main_problem_disable_protection.message: A problem on this site ? Try to deactivate.

popup_settings_telemetry_label.message: Help Qwant improve the extension by sending anonymous error reports and usage statistics.

protection_level_disabled_description.message: The browsing protection is disabled, Qwant remains your default search engine.

protection_level_standard_description.message: Blocks most trackers and cookies efficiently.

protection_level_strict_description.message: Blocks all trackers and cookies, may affect some sites.

upsell_mobile_title.message: Get Qwant VIPrivacy on your phone!
